description: The Sapuen High GTX is the right choice on all kinds of terrain. Mammut Flextron® technology supports the natural rolling movement of the foot and thus more efficient use of energy when hiking and mountaineering, while Mammut Georganic® 3D technology guarantees maximum comfort. All components in contact with the foot are anatomically shaped with great precision while the classic tongue construction offers easy entry. Optimized for hiking: a Vibram rubber blend for secure grip on outdoor surfaces and a sole design that supports self-cleaning. The waterproof GORE-TEX membrane guarantees dry feet.
name: Mammut Sapuen High GTX - Mens (Prior Season)
